headline: 3 Ultra-Reliable Dividend Stocks Yielding Over 3% to Double Up on in June for Passive Income
summary: It will take a significant decline in the price of oil before Devon Energy will be unable to pay its fixed dividend.  Brookfield Infrastructure generates strong funds from operations, suggesting its dividend isn't in danger of seeing a reduction anytime soon.  Clorox's falling stock price fails to reflect progress in the underlying business.
